desc: Our one-of-a-kind, heirloom quality, handmade dolls are hand-stitched by our small team of artisans led by Joti Marra in the Mountains of Western North Carolina. Forest Creatures are Pixie Dolls, Forest Friends, Fairytale Friends, Petal Pixies, Unicorn Dolls, Fairy Dolls, Forest Fairies and handmade doll clothes
